trusted_partner: Your trusted partner for quick grocery delivery. Fresh products, fast delivery, and excellent service.
help_center_content:
Welcome to our Help Center! Here you can find answers to common questions and get assistance with your orders.

• How to place an order
• How to track your order
• How to modify or cancel orders
• Payment methods and security
• Delivery options and timeframes
• Account management

If you need further assistance, please contact our customer support team.
contact_us_content:
We're here to help! You can reach us through multiple channels:

📧 Email: info@forgehivesolutions.com
📞 Phone: +91 9073098038
📍 Address: Dumdum, Kolkata

Our customer support team is available 24/7 to assist you with:
• Order inquiries
• Technical support
• Feedback and suggestions
• Partnership opportunities

We typically respond within 2-4 hours during business hours.
faq_content:
Frequently Asked Questions:

Q: How fast is your delivery?
A: We offer delivery in 10-30 minutes for most areas.

Q: What payment methods do you accept?
A: We accept cash on delivery, UPI, credit/debit cards, and digital wallets.

Q: Can I cancel my order?
A: Yes, you can cancel orders before they are confirmed. Contact us immediately.

Q: What if I receive damaged items?
A: We offer full refunds for damaged or incorrect items. Contact us within 24 hours.

Q: Do you deliver to my area?
A: Check your delivery address during checkout to confirm availability.

Q: How can I track my order?
A: Use the tracking number provided in your order confirmation email/SMS.
returns_refunds_content:
Our Returns & Refunds Policy:

✅ Easy Returns:
• Damaged or incorrect items
• Quality issues
• Wrong products delivered

⏰ Return Window:
• 24 hours for fresh products
• 7 days for packaged goods

📋 Return Process:
1. Contact customer support
2. Provide order details and reason
3. We'll arrange pickup or replacement
4. Refund processed within 3-5 business days

💰 Refund Methods:
• Original payment method
• Store credit for future orders

❌ Non-Returnable Items:
• Personal hygiene products
• Opened food items
• Custom orders

For immediate assistance, call us at +91 9073098038
privacy_policy_content:
Privacy Policy

Last updated: December 2024

🔒 Information We Collect:
• Personal information (name, email, phone, address)
• Payment information (processed securely)
• Order history and preferences
• Device and usage information

📱 How We Use Your Information:
• Process and fulfill your orders
• Communicate order updates and support
• Improve our services and user experience
• Send promotional offers (with consent)
• Ensure security and prevent fraud

🛡️ Data Protection:
• We use industry-standard encryption
• Your data is stored securely
• We never sell your personal information
• Access is limited to authorized personnel only

🔗 Third-Party Services:
• Payment processors (secure and compliant)
• Delivery partners (limited information only)
• Analytics services (anonymized data)

📞 Your Rights:
• Access your personal data
• Request data correction or deletion
• Opt-out of marketing communications
• Contact us for privacy concerns

📧 Contact Us:
For privacy-related questions:
Email: privacy@forgehivesolutions.com
Phone: +91 9073098038

This policy is regularly updated. Please check back for changes.
terms_of_service_content:
Terms of Service

Last updated: December 2024

📋 Acceptance of Terms:
By using SwiftCart, you agree to these terms and conditions. If you disagree, please do not use our service.

🛒 Order and Payment:
• All prices are in INR and include applicable taxes
• Payment is required at the time of order
• We reserve the right to refuse service
• Orders are subject to product availability

🚚 Delivery:
• Delivery times are estimates only
• We deliver to specified service areas
• Risk transfers upon delivery completion
• Delivery fees apply as shown during checkout

📦 Returns and Refunds:
• Damaged or incorrect items: 24-hour return window
• Quality issues: 7-day return window
• Refunds processed within 3-5 business days
• Non-returnable items clearly marked

⚖️ User Responsibilities:
• Provide accurate information
• Maintain account security
• Comply with applicable laws
• Use service for lawful purposes only

🚫 Prohibited Activities:
• Fraudulent transactions
• Harassment of delivery partners
• Violation of intellectual property rights
• Attempts to breach security

🔧 Service Availability:
• We strive for 24/7 availability
• Maintenance may cause temporary outages
• We're not liable for service interruptions

📞 Dispute Resolution:
• Contact customer support first
• Escalate to management if needed
• Legal jurisdiction: Kolkata, India

📧 Contact:
Email: legal@forgehivesolutions.com
Phone: +91 9073098038
cookie_policy_content:
Cookie Policy

Last updated: December 2024

🍪 What Are Cookies:
Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us provide a better user experience.

📊 Types of Cookies We Use:

🔐 Essential Cookies:
• Session management and security
• Shopping cart functionality
• User authentication
• These cannot be disabled

📈 Analytics Cookies:
• Website usage statistics
• Performance monitoring
• User behavior analysis
• Help improve our services

🎯 Marketing Cookies:
• Personalized recommendations
• Targeted advertising
• Social media integration
• Can be disabled in settings

⚙️ Third-Party Cookies:
• Payment processors (secure)
• Analytics services (Google Analytics)
• Social media platforms
• Delivery tracking services

🔧 Managing Cookies:
• Browser settings control
• Clear cookies regularly
• Disable non-essential cookies
• Mobile app permissions

📱 Mobile App Cookies:
• Similar functionality to web
• App-specific storage
• Device preferences
• Offline functionality

🛡️ Cookie Security:
• Encrypted transmission
• Secure storage
• No personal data in cookies
• Regular security updates

📞 Your Choices:
• Accept all cookies
• Reject non-essential cookies
• Clear cookies anytime
• Contact us for concerns

📧 Contact:
Email: privacy@forgehivesolutions.com
Phone: +91 9073098038

We update this policy as our practices change.
